description: A variation on the sieve of Eratosthenes (A000040): Start with the primes; the first term is 2, which is a(1) and we cross off every second prime starting with 2; the next prime not crossed off is 3, which is a(2) and we cross off every third prime starting with 3; the next prime not crossed off is 7, which is a(3) and we cross off every 7th prime starting with 7; and so on.
